name: ADT_ORDER_INFORMATION
description: This table contains information about ADT Orders.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: ACCOMMODATION_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the accommodation code.

columns.name: ACCOM_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the accommodation code reason.

columns.name: ADT_ADMT_PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: ADT_ATTEND_PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: ADM_COND_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the patient condition.

columns.name: ADT_CONSULT_PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: ADT_DX_ID_DX_NAME
columns.description: The name of the diagnosis.

columns.name: ADT_EXPECT_ADMSN_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date the patient is expected to be admitted.

columns.name: ADT_EXPECT_DISCHRG_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date the patient is expected to be discharged.

columns.name: ADT_EXPECT_STAY_LEN
columns.description: Stores the number of days the patient is expected to stay.

columns.name: PAS_HAR_CHNG_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the reason why the patient's current hospital account is ending, and a new hospital account is beginning.

columns.name: ADT_LOC_ID_LOC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue location.

columns.name: ADT_INTERN_PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: LEVEL_OF_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the level of care.

columns.name: ADT_PAT_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the patient class.

columns.name: REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the reason for inserting a patient update event.

columns.name: ADT_RES_PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: ADT_RESP_LOC_ID_LOC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue location.

columns.name: ADT_RESP_DEPARTMENT_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: The external name of the department record. This is often used in patient correspondence such as reminder letters.

columns.name: HOSP_SERV_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the service.

columns.name: ADT_SERV_AREA_ID_LOC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue location.

columns.name: ADT_DEPARTMENT_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: The external name of the department record. This is often used in patient correspondence such as reminder letters.
